name: uk_branch_lookup
description: Searches for the closest Barclays Branch in the UK given a valid location name or postal code using geocoding.

location.description: this can be a place name in the UK or a valid UK postal code

instruction: Use this tool to find branch locations. Ask for town or postcode if not provided. If a search for 'Town, County' fails, retry automatically with just 'Town'. Do NOT guess locations.
